::Firearm/Fliq/Grimmler::

"You're welcome," Firearm says, kneeling down near another console. 
His gun arm transforms into its tool mode, beginning to work on 
repairing the comp.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Fliq and Grimmler walk into the bridge at the same, looking around. 
Grimmler motions to one of the broken consoles. "Here, let's get 
working," he says to Fliq, the two bots walking to the console and 
getting to work.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "FIRE FOX" <firefox_y2k@h...> wrote:
> (I apologize for taking so long to reply. I've had difficulties 
with a site 
> of mine that doesn't want to cooperate *grrrrr*^_^)
> 
> Hysteria/Tavatron
> 
> Hysteria:
> 
> Hysteria dropped to all fours and peered beneath the main console 
again. It 
> had taken her quite a while, but she was almost done. A few more 
connections 
> and the console should be working again:
> 
> "That's great Firearm, thanks for the help."
> 
> Hysteria rolled onto her back and picked up her small welder. She 
made a few 
> more adjustments and then hit the power switch in the back of the 
console. 
> The console itself flickered to life. It was still a mess, but at 
least it 
> was functional.
